paper_abstract: This article contains the report on AIMS 2010, which was held June 23-25, 2010 at the Department of Informatics ( IFI), University of Zurich, Switzerland and which was driven by the theme "Mechanisms for Autonomous Management of Networks and Services''. Furthermore, the report also synopsizes ISSNSM 2010, which was run June 21-23, 2010 at the same location and which offered a practical summer school on selected topics in network and service management.
paper_title: Report on the 4th International Conference on Autonomous Infrastructures, Management, and Security (AIMS 2010) and the International Summer School on Network and Service Management (ISSNSM 2010)
